title: Government shutdown won't be significant to the market, says AEI's Pethokoukis
text:
For IE9 users - IE9 is supported, but it's Compatibility View feature is not. The fix is simple - turn off Compatibility View mode. Here is how: Select Tool form the Menu Bar (if it's not visible, press Alt on your keyboard).

Select Compatibility View Settings. A panel will open. Uncheck all 3 options at the bottom of the panel.

Select the Close button to save your changes.

Reload the page, and enjoy.

Your browser needs a tune up...

To play our content, your browser needs to be the latest version. Please update your browser and reload the page.
description: CNBC's John Harwood and James Pethokoukis, Economic Policy Analyst with the American Enterprise Institute, discuss President Trump's public confrontation with Nancy Pelosi and Chuck Schumer over border security.
